description.content:
I'm an experienced WordPress website developer and lead a team that includes HTML, CSS, JS, and PHP developers. I can develop any type of website for your business. If you have any WordPress website issues and you need help, let me solve your problems. You can order for any type of WordPress error, issue, problem, customization, etc. I will fix your problems as you need.


Our Servies:

  • WP theme and plugin development
  • Fix CSS issues
  • Fixing errors
  • Theme customization
  • Plugin errors
  • Internal Server Error
  • Syntax W0rdPress Error
  • Error Establishing A Database Connection
  • Clean malware Virus or Malicious code
  • HTTP Error 403 Forbidden
  • Connection Timed Out Error
  • Website Consultation
  • Web and Multimedia Development
  • HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, PHP
  • Bootstrap Front-End Framework
  • Theme Development
  • Child Themes
  • Plugin Development
  • HTML to WP Conversions
  • PSD to WP
  • SEO - Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Management
  • Lead Generation Campaigns
  • Website Maintenance
  • Hosting Management
  • Elementor page builder issues
  • WP Bakery page builder issues
  • WPLMS, Learn Dash, LearnPress
  • Hosting management
  • Donations management

If your business depends on WEB technology and it needs to run FLAWLESSLY then contact us TODAY.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting/domain name registration?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I do not provide hosting/domain name registration. In order to have full control over the website, it is highly recommended that you purchase these yourself in your name. I recommend purchasing shared/web hosting plans from Hostinger, Bluehost, Namecheap, and HostGator.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm a Newbie . Will you help me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I always guide new customers with more focus. Let us know what you're requiring? If you have any doubts in your mind, let us know, and we'll help you out.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I contact you before placing order to discuss about project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, absolutely you can contact me anytime for a chat just to make sure that we both are on the same page and also to make it clear that can I does that or not. If you are unclear about anything I will be happy to assist you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you develop a complete WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can develop any type of complete website. Please share details in the inbox to get the custom offer.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you design custom theme or custom design website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can develop a custom theme or cust design website according to the given requirements. Please inbox me the details to get the custom offer. Above mentioned packages didn't include any custom theme or custom website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after order delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. We will provide free support with training about how to manage website-related things. If there would anything happens we will sort it out.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will be able to edit my website easily? I don't know programming!
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Your website will be fully editable without programming! You will be able to very easily add text, and images to all pages with a few clicks! You will be able to edit eCommerce products, their images, title, description, and prices. Also, you can easily add unlimited pages and blog (news) posts too.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm ready to purchase! What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need a domain name with a hosting account (if you don't have these, I will assist you). I will also need a logo (optional), name and number of pages, and about information of your company (organization), email address, and contact number to display and configure the contact form.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I check your email / contact / Skype details so we can communicate easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sorry! This is against the Fiverr TOS. All communication with the client is to be done in writing via the Fiverr message board or we can initiate a zoom call within the Fiverr chat room. I don't accept the job offers that against Fiverr TOS.

packageList.title: WordPress Bug Fixing
packageList.description: I will fix any kind of jQuery, CSS, Responsive, Speed and W3C Validations errors.

packageList.title: WordPress Website Creation
packageList.description:
I will setup WordPress, install required theme and plugins.
Import relevant demo.
Create 3-4 pages

packageList.title: Enterprise Website Creation

I will create enterprise website with required features.
Setup all the things and create 7-8 pages.
